ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The only good dragon...
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of Veeshan... I was given a tip about a dwarf(?) in Dagnors Cauldron that is blue to 50 and on a 6 min timer.  Only thing is that you lose faction
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of Veeshan...

I was given a tip about a dwarf(?) in Dagnors Cauldron that is blue to 50
and on a 6 min timer. Only thing is that you lose faction with Veeshan. I
wonder if that would matter as far as getting quests in the Plane of Sky???

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <firehawk@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 9:45 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] The only good dragon...


> From: firehawk@...
>
> Speaking as a bard of Veeshan.. I object to your comment of the only good
dragon is a dead dragon. Please use the politically correct statement is
the only good insane evil raving dragon is a dead insane evil raving dragon.
